headline: Rockwell Automation Declares Quarterly Dividend at $1.31 Per Share on Common Stock
summary: MILWAUKEE, April 01, 2025--The Board of Directors of Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), following its regular review, today declared a quarterly dividend of $1.31 per share on its outstanding common stock, payable June 10, 2025, to shareowners of record at the close of business on May 19, 2025.

headline: Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) Launches Emulate3D Factory Test While Shares Dip 4%
summary: Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) recently launched its Emulate3D Factory Test at Hannover Messe, introducing advanced digital twin technology. Despite these product innovations, the company's share price moved 3.6% lower over the past week. This decline comes amid broader market movements influenced by uncertainty surrounding upcoming tariffs and economic growth concerns. While Rockwell remains committed to technological advancement, these macroeconomic factors, alongside mixed performances in...

headline: Wall Street Lunch: OpenAI Leads Biggest Private Companies
summary: OpenAI's latest funding round has propelled the startup beyond other unicorns to the rank of the highest valued private company in the world.
